mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_ID AS userId, A.USER_NM AS name, A.DEPTCD AS deptCd, B.DEPTNM AS deptNm, A.JIKGUBCD AS jikgubCd, C.JIKGUBNM AS jikgubNm, A.CEO AS ceo FROM UI_USERS A LEFT JOIN UI_DEPT B ON (A.DEPTCD = B.DEPTCD) LEFT JOIN UI_JIKGUB C ON (A.JIKGUBCD = C.JIKGUBCD) ORDER BY A.USER_ID
SELECT USER_ID AS userId, USER_IP AS ip FROM UI_USER_IP A ORDER BY USER_ID
SELECT USER_ID AS coCd, USER_IP AS busiCd, USER_IP AS date, USER_IP AS comments FROM UI_USER_IP A ORDER BY USER_ID
SELECT USER_ID AS coCd, USER_IP AS busiCd, USER_IP AS wDay, USER_IP AS wHour FROM UI_USER_IP A ORDER BY USER_ID
